name: my-quote-db
description: I offline program that contains a quote database from [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/akmittal/quotes-dataset). Example data: ```json {     "Quote": "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.",     "Author": "Dr. Seuss",     "Tags": [       "attributed-no-source",       "cry",       "crying",       "experience",       "happiness",       "joy",       "life",       "misattributed-dr-seuss",       "optimism",       "sadness",       "smile",       "smiling "     ],     "Popularity": 0.15566615566615566,     "Category": "life" } ``` ## Setup (Locally) - ``git clone ...`` - ``cd my-quote-db``
